description:
The American Film Institute has picked its 10 best movies and TV shows of the year. The titles, presented in alphabetical order, are works AFI's juries have determined advance the art of the moving image, enhance the cultural heritage of America's art form, inspire audiences and artists and make a mark on American society.美国电影学会挑选了今年的10部最佳电影和电视节目。按字母顺序呈现的作品标题即为美国电影学会评委会挑选出来的作品，他们认为这些作品促进了活动图像的艺术化、提升了美国艺术形式文化遗产的魅力、激发了观众和艺术家们的热情，且在美国社会颇有名望。

In addition to the 20 honorees, AFI is giving a special award to O.J.: Made in America, a nearly eight-hour-long documentary that aired on TV.除了20部获奖作品，美国电影学会还为《幸普森：美国制造》授予了特别奖，这是一部在电视上播送的纪录片，时长近8个小时。

"AFI Awards is proud to recognize the achievements of the teams who have enlightened and informed us, guided and inspired us, and ultimately invited us to empathize with others in a reminder of our humanity." AFI president and CEO Bob Gazzale said Thursday in a statement.“美国电影协会奖以表彰这些团队所取得的成就而自豪，这些团队启发并影响了我们，指导并鼓舞了我们，最重要的是，他们使我们想起了仁爱，并使我们与他人产生共鸣。”美国电影学会主席兼执行总裁鲍勃·加扎勒在星期四发表的一份声明中说道。

This year's juries were chaired by producers and AFI board of trustees vice chairs Tom Pollock (for film) and Richard Frank (for TV). Other jury members included Elizabeth Banks, Robert Benton, Diane English, Jon Hamm, Michelle King, Lori McCreary, Rachel Morrison, Patricia Riggen, Mark Harris, Leonard Maltin, authors and scholars representing prestigious universities, and film and TV critics from media outlets including the Los Angeles Times and TV Guide.美国电影学会理事委员会副主席兼制片人汤姆·波洛克和理查德·弗兰克分别主持了今年的电影和电视节目评委会。其他评审员包括伊丽莎白·班克斯、罗伯特·本顿、黛安·英格兰、乔恩·哈姆、米歇尔·金、洛里·麦克利里、蕾切尔·莫里森、帕特里夏·里根、迈克·哈里斯、雷纳德·马尔丁、作家、名校学者代表以及《洛杉矶时报》、《电视指南》等当地媒体的电影、电视评论员。

The list of this year's honorees今年的获奖名单

 

AFI Movies of the Year美国电影学会年度电影

Arrival《降临》

Fences《围栏》

Hacksaw Ridge《血战钢锯岭》

Hell or High Water《赴汤蹈火》

La La Land《爱乐之城》

Manchester by the Sea《海边的曼彻斯特》

Moonlight《血色月光》

Silence《沉寂》

Sully《萨利机长》

Zootopia《疯狂动物城》

AFI TV Programs of the Year美国电影学会年度电视节目

The Americans《美国谍梦》

Atlanta《亚特兰大》

Better Call Saul《绝命律师》

The Crown《王冠》

Game of Thrones《权力的游戏》

The Night Of《罪恶之奔》

The People v. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story《美国罪案故事：公诉辛普森案》

Stranger Things《怪奇物语》

This Is Us《我们这一天》

Veep《副总统》

AFI Special Award美国电影学会特别奖

O.J.: Made in America《辛普森：美国制造》
